contentrichtext.text: {{ref improve|date=January 2013}} {{Infobox person |bgcolour = silver | name = Xavier Saint-Macary | image = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = {{Birth date|1948|6|7|mf=y}} | birth_place = [[Orléans]], [[France]] | death_date = {{Death date and age|1988|3|13|1948|6|7}} | death_place = [[Paris]], [[France]] | years_active = [[1972 in film|1972]] - [[1988 in film|1988]] | height = }} '''Xavier Saint-Macary''' (June 7, 1948-March 13, 1988) was a [[France|French]] [[actor]], brother of [[Hubert Saint-Macary]].<ref>[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0756732/ IMDB entry]</ref> Saint-Macary played in ''[[Day for Night (film)|La Nuit américaine]]'' (1973) directed by [[Francois Truffaut]] and ''[[Le Château perdu]]'' (1973). American audiences will remember him as the enthusiastic but bumbling Detective Fontenoy in the [[Walt Disney|Disney]] movie ''[[Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo]]'' (1977). Saint-Macary died of a sudden [[myocardial infarction|heart attack]] in 1988, a few months short of his 40th birthday. ==Selected filmography== * ''[[Dites-lui que je l'aime]]'' (1977) * ''[[Loulou (film)|Loulou]]'' (1980) * ''[[Confidentially Yours]]'' (1983) * ''[[Détective]]'' (1985) ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0756732/ Xavier Saint-Macary at IMDB] {{Authority control|VIAF=7575198}} <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]] --> {{Persondata |NAME= Saint-Macary, Xavier |ALTERNATIVE NAMES= |SHORT DESCRIPTION=[[Actor]] |DATE OF BIRTH= 1948-6-7 |PLACE OF BIRTH= [[Orléans]], [[France]] |DATE OF DEATH= 1988-3-13 |PLACE OF DEATH= [[Paris]], [[France]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Saint-Macary, Xavier}} [[Category:1948 births]] [[Category:1988 deaths]] [[Category:People from Orléans]] [[Category:French actors]] {{France-actor-stub}}
